text: Pump Up the Volume is a 1990 American Canadian comedy movie. Christian Slater and Samantha Mathis star. The movie received positive reviews from the critics. This movie was released August 22, 1990. Category:1990 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Canadian comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Allan Moyle Category:Movies about radio people Category:Movies about freedom of expression Category:Movies set in Arizona
title: Pump Up the Volume (movie)
